questStage.name: level1
questStage.prompt: You have accrued significant experience, and feel as though you've grown as one of the Saint's paladins.

option.description: Your body swells with newfound vigor & power (+1 STR)
You feel as though you've matured and are now more able (+1 SKL)
You are filled with renewed committment to your purpose (+1 WLP)
